name: Layers of Dawn
description:
Gameplay

Layer of Dawn is a Zombie Horde survival game. Use your shotgun to defend yourself against. Use your shotgun to defend yourself against the onslaught of zombies. Stay alive as long as you can and achieve your personal high score.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • MOUSE - Look
  • LMB - Fire
  • R - Reload
  • SPACE - JUMP
  • SHIFT - Sprint
  • ESC - Pause
  • X - Freeze time
  • Y - Unfreeze time
  • Q - Restart*
  • E - Go to menu*

*only Pause Menu/ Death Screen
